m_szDocTitle: Analyst: Apple Eyeing Augmented Reality | News & Opinion  | PCMag.com
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Analyst: Apple Eyeing Augmented Reality Analyst: Apple Eyeing Augmented Reality Analyst Gene Munster believes the company is working on a fashion-forward wearable interface that people would actually buy. With an electric vehicle and a streaming TV service reportedly in the works, what's next for Apple? Augmented reality, according to Piper Jaffray senior research analyst Gene Munster. The tech giant has already assembled a small group, "likely trying to understand a wearable interface that design would ultimately make fashionable/socially acceptable," Munster
